#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Holes.

== Name ==

*[CHoles Holes]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Holes (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			The Holes element groups 1 to 18 Hole descriptions.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  [CHole hole]{0,18}  </...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CHole golfml:Hole] || [CHole hole] ||  					Collection of 1 to 18 holes of golf.				 ||

    	[CGolfCourse GolfCourse]
